Question: This person has also served as a commentator and analyst for the Tennis Channel since the US Open tournament of 2009.
Hints: This person won three year-end championship titles, including two WCT Finals and one Masters Grand Prix.
This person' best win during 1979–81 was the 1980 WCT Finals, when he defeated the defending champion, John McEnroe.
In April, this person met Newcombe in a match billed as a $250,000 winner-takes-all.
